## ğŸ“š HOW TO USE THE VALIDATION RESULTS

### Review the Reports
```bash
# Read comprehensive report
cat VALIDATION_REPORT.md

# Read executive summary
cat EXECUTION_SUMMARY.md

# See artifacts overview
cat VALIDATION_ARTIFACTS.md
```

### Run Validation Tests
```bash
# Quick structural check (2-3 sec)
python validate_consolidated_agents.py

# Full configuration testing (5-10 sec)
python test_agent_usability.py

# Comprehensive testing (30-60 sec)
python test_agents_comprehensive.py
```

### Review Test Results
```bash
# View JSON results
cat validation_report.json | python -m json.tool
```
